creator: peter.thomas@readi-systems.com
text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #43792 +++

mod_ldap as implemented supports only simple LDAP authentication [through a call to ldap_simple_bind_s()].

LDAP clients expected to bind to the server using SASL are not supported by mod_ldap as written.
Could not find the referenced patch.
creator: peter.thomas@readi-systems.com
